maps.gml.editor

Class ProgressFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • maps.gml.editor.AbstractFunction
      • maps.gml.editor.ProgressFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddNoiseFunction, ComputePassableEdgesFunction, FixAttachedObjectsFunction, FixDegenerateShapesFunction, FixDuplicateEdgesFunction, FixNearbyNodesFunction, SplitEdgesFunction

    public abstract class ProgressFunction
extends AbstractFunction
    Abstract base class for Function implementations that require a progress dialog.
